name: default
description: Creates a field with the specified name and value. If the field already exists on an event, the field keeps its existing value. Useful for providing default values for missing fields.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Default value to set if field doesn't exist

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Field name(s) to apply default value to

parameters.name: replaceEmpty
parameters.description: If true, replaces empty strings with the default value (default: false)

notes: replaceEmpty=true is necessary to populate fields listed as <empty_string>.
